blacklist.description: Make arrangements for the Filo's blacklist system.

view.description: Shows information of the specified user or guild.

arguments.type: Specify if you want to show the information of a user or guild.
arguments.value: Specify the user or guild ID (as specified above).

appeal.description: Manages the appeal of a ban from a user or guild.

arguments.type: Specify if you want to show the information of a user or guild.
arguments.value: Specify the user ID or guild ID (as specified above).
arguments.approve: Specify whether you want to approve or deny the appeal.
arguments.custom_reason: Specify a custom reason (in case the predefined reasons don't fit the case).

add.description: Add a new ban to a user or guild.

arguments.type: Specify if you want to show the information of a user or guild.
arguments.value: Specify the user ID or guild ID (as specified above).
arguments.custom_reason: Specify a custom reason (in case the predefined reasons don't fit the case).

delete.description: Delete the information of a ban from a user or guild.

arguments.type: Specify if you want to show the information of a user or guild.
arguments.value: Specify the user ID or guild ID (as specified above).

flags.description: Manage the flags of a user.

set.description: Set the flags of a user.

arguments.user: User to whom you want to set the flags.
arguments.flags: Flags in bits that you want to set to this user.

add.description: Add a flag to a user.

arguments.user: User to which you want to add a flag.
arguments.flag: Flag that you want to add to the user

remove.description: Remove a flag to a user.

arguments.user: User to which you want to remove a flag.
arguments.flag: Flag that you want to remove to the user.

view.description: See the flags of another user.

arguments.user: User to whom you want to see the flags.

reset.description: Reset all the flags of a user.

arguments.user: User to whom you want to reset all the flags.
